data.name: CampaignAnalytics_Description
data.value:
• Analyze campaigns in real-time
  • Identify changes in customer trends and sentiment
  • Compare actual revenue, costs, and ROI for segments, campaigns, channels, and more

data.name: CampaignAnalytics_Tagline
data.value: Turn marketing data into actionable insight with interactive dashboards that make results accessible.

data.name: CampaignAnalytics_Title
data.value: Campaign Analytics

data.name: CapexManagement_Description
data.value:
• Detect unexpected cost increases earlier with real-time updates
  • React quickly to changes and enable corrective action
  • Share reports out to the right teams in just a few clicks

data.name: CapexManagement_Tagline
data.value: Free up time for strategic analysis – no more hunting for data.

data.name: CapexManagement_Title
data.value: Capex Management

data.name: ClaimsAnalysis_Description
data.value:
• Improve efficiency by analyzing metrics like past total claims, production output, or shipment times
  • See your data on a dashboard with drag-and-drop capabilities and stunning visuals
  • Maintain one version of the truth across departments and tell a clearer story

data.name: ClaimsAnalysis_Tagline
data.value: React faster with mobile alerts for shipping gaps, stock shortages, and other time-sensitive needs.

data.name: ClaimsAnalysis_Title
data.value: Claims Analysis

data.name: ComplianceTraining_Description
data.value:
• Monitor the progress and growth of individuals against goals and role-based metrics
  • Investigate in real-time by clicking down into underlying data
  • Ask questions in natural language using Power BI’s intuitive Q&A format

data.name: ComplianceTraining_Tagline
data.value: Make informed decisions with interactive dashboards that make detailed data accessible.

data.name: ComplianceTraining_Title
data.value: Compliance Training

data.name: EmailAnalytics_Description
data.value:
• Leverage out-of-the-box dashboards and reports to quickly understand campaign outcomes
  • Compare results across campaigns, customer segments, and geographies
  • Discover how to better tailor your marketing approach for specific audiences

data.name: EmailAnalytics_Tagline
data.value: Tell the right story with real-time information that communicates important outcomes such as ROI.

data.name: EmailAnalytics_Title
data.value: Email Analytics

data.name: ExpenseManagement_Description
data.value:
• Detect expense outliers and anomalies early with intuitive visualizations
  • Analyze trends and patterns to proactively search for indications of fraud and abuse
  • Ensure that your data is always fresh with automatic updates

data.name: ExpenseManagement_Tagline
data.value: Get a single-pane view of your financials with all of your data sources in a single model.

data.name: ExpenseManagement_Title
data.value: Expense Management

data.name: Finance_Description
data.value: Are you getting the answers you need about financial performance? Power BI makes it easy by collecting the data from every source, external and on-premises, and giving you drag-and-drop visualization tools to quickly analyze and explore your insights.

data.name: Finance_DetailTagline
data.value: Convert bottom lines into top strategies

data.name: Finance_IndexTagline
data.value: Get the answers you need from your numbers

data.name: Finance_Title
data.value: Finance

data.name: FinancialPerformance_Description
data.value:
• See all of your data in a single view, from summary statements to account-level details
  • Click to drill down into specific regions or segments
  • Make decisions faster with real-time updates

data.name: FinancialPerformance_Tagline
data.value: Get the full picture across different data sources in seconds.

data.name: FinancialPerformance_Title
data.value: Financial Performance

data.name: HeadcountSummary_Description
data.value:
• Gain insight into the latest trends in employee retention and turnover
  • Stay current by scheduling automatic data refresh
  • Enable mobile alerts to inform you of changes to your recruiting pipeline

data.name: HeadcountSummary_Tagline
data.value: Plan more effectively by viewing current and forecasted needs in one place.

data.name: HeadcountSummary_Title
data.value: Headcount Summary

data.name: HelpDesk_Description
data.value:
• Streamline ticket resolution by optimizing Help Desk resources based on trend data
  • Visually compare key metrics in real-time, including Help Desk traffic and top issues
  • Build better relationships with your customers by reducing help ticket satisfaction

data.name: HelpDesk_Tagline
data.value: Identify risks sooner by tracking key metrics in real-time.

data.name: HelpDesk_Title
data.value: Help Desk

data.name: HumanResources_Description
data.value: Need to stay up-to-date on the progress of your initiatives? Power BI has tools to easily collect and monitor all of your important data. Better protect your colleagues and your organization with insightful dashboards to track compliance, headcount, and more.

data.name: HumanResources_DetailTagline
data.value: Turn your data into new opportunities

data.name: HumanResources_IndexTagline
data.value: Get data-driven policymaking for your organization

data.name: HumanResources_Title
data.value: Human Resources

data.name: ITSpend_Description
data.value:
• Connect Power BI easily to other tools
  • Integrate Power BI with your existing solutions for an end-to-end approach to data analytics
  • Work equally well with Microsoft products like Azure Active Directory and non-Microsoft products like SAP

data.name: ITSpend_Tagline
data.value: See everything in one place including network systems, services, applications, and security data.

data.name: ITSpend_Title
data.value: IT Spend

data.name: IT_Description
data.value: Want to improve productivity in a quick and affordable way? With Power BI, you can create dashboards in seconds that monitor and analyze everything from Active Directory to Zendesk, and it integrates seamlessly with SSAS for when you need enterprise-scale BI solutions.

data.name: IT_DetailTagline
data.value: Make Business Intelligence more accessible

data.name: IT_IndexTagline
data.value: Monitor all of your systems from one dashboard

data.name: IT_Title
data.value: IT

data.name: Marketing_Description
data.value: Are you overwhelmed by data from all the different tools you use? Make it simple: with Power BI, you can easily monitor and analyze your marketing campaigns and efficiently allocate your resources to the right channels, all in one place.

data.name: Marketing_DetailTagline
data.value: Build profitable customer relationships

data.name: Marketing_IndexTagline
data.value: Monitor all your campaigns from one dashboard

data.name: Marketing_Title
data.value: Marketing

data.name: MarketShare_Description
data.value:
• Publish and present Market Share leveraging interactive visualizations
  • Take corrective action faster with enhanced visibility to all aspects of the campaign
  • Share your findings anywhere, including mobile

data.name: MarketShare_Tagline
data.value: Find actionable insights and publish them instantly to interactive dashboards accessible from all devices.

data.name: MarketShare_Title
data.value: Market Share

data.name: Operations_Description
data.value: Is your organization truly data-driven? With Power BI you can quickly monitor and engage with your data from all sources, including Excel workbooks, on-premises databases, and cloud services. Find new insights for your production, store performance, claims analysis, and more.

data.name: Operations_DetailTagline
data.value: Stay a step ahead of demand

data.name: Operations_IndexTagline
data.value: Engage with your data and find new efficiencies

data.name: Operations_Title
data.value: Operations

data.name: PipelineReports_Description
data.value:
• Track your sales pipeline in real-time
  • Accurately inform sales forecasts and plans
  • Easily connect and manipulate data in one location for more comprehensive analysis

data.name: PipelineReports_Tagline
data.value: Make more informed decisions by quickly accessing detailed sales data.

data.name: PipelineReports_Title
data.value: Pipeline Reports

data.name: Production_Description
data.value:
• Lead stand-up meetings on the factory floor with live dashboards
  • Optimize manufacturing performance
  • Easily identify areas for process improvement

data.name: Production_Tagline
data.value: Improve insight by combining data from production to distribution.

data.name: Production_Title
data.value: Production

data.name: QuotaManagement_Description
data.value:
• Gain insight into sales progress against forecasts
  • Easily analyze the performance of specific geographies or individual account owners

data.name: QuotaManagement_Tagline
data.value: Make data-driven decisions about the future based on past and present information.

data.name: QuotaManagement_Title
data.value: Quota Management

data.name: RevenueProfitability_Description
data.value:
• React quickly to the latest revenue data with on-demand reports
  • Mash up data to identify variances
  • Forecast with enough time to course correct when necessary

data.name: RevenueProfitability_Tagline
data.value: Deliver answers fast with executive-level financial dashboards.

data.name: RevenueProfitability_Title
data.value: Revenue & Profitability

data.name: SalesPerformance_Description
data.value:
• Leverage live data and real-time dashboards to review current sales performance
  • Easily identify underperforming areas of your business
  • Determine the variance between actual revenue and sales targets by segment

data.name: SalesPerformance_Tagline
data.value: Get a single, holistic view of your sales performance across segments.

data.name: SalesPerformance_Title
data.value: Sales Performance

data.name: Sales_Description
data.value: Want to forecast sales better, hit that record sales target, and increase profitability per sale? Power BI brings your company's sales pipeline under a magnifying glass in seconds with dashboards that include your Microsoft Dynamics CRM or Salesforce.com data.

data.name: Sales_DetailTagline
data.value: Convert bottom lines into top strategies

data.name: Sales_IndexTagline
data.value: Crush you quotas and forecast better for the future

data.name: Sales_Title
data.value: Sales

data.name: SecurityCompliance_Description
data.value:
• Enhance network security with early visibility of compliance risks
  • Track adherence to security, software, and other standards in real time
  • Pool security data, like network access logs, and display it visually on a single dashboard

data.name: SecurityCompliance_Tagline
data.value: Give your users data independence through easer report development that combines multiple sources into a single model.

data.name: SecurityCompliance_Title
data.value: Security & Compliance

data.name: StorePerformance_Description

  • Closely manage inventory counts with live metrics that tell the whole story
  • Easily spot trends to better analyze which product to prioritize

data.name: StorePerformance_Tagline
data.value: Keep teams on the same page by sharing the latest operational data in a few clicks.

data.name: StorePerformance_Title

data.name: Trends_Description

data.name: Trends_Title
